rooms.name: Entrance Hall / Foyer
rooms.description: This space leads into the main living areas and is strategically located near the front door to maximize natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. According to Vastu, it aligns with the north-east direction for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on one side, promoting brightness and connectivity with the outdoors. Its layout follows Vastu recommendations by placing it in the south-east corner.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for convenience during meals. Open floor plan design complements the Vastu principles with a central placement, ensuring balance and harmony.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, functional kitchen with ample storage space. Positioned in the north-west area as per Vastu guidelines to enhance prosperity and efficient energy flow. Floor-to-ceiling windows are included for natural lighting.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Conveniently located near the entrance. Placed in a south-east quadrant following Vastu recommendations to maintain balance in guest spaces.

openings.description: Installed on walls that face the garden area for maximum natural light, ensuring energy efficiency while adhering to both modern design trends and Vastu principles.

openings.location: Side of the house adjoining the driveway
openings.description: A two-car garage integrated with floor-to-ceiling glass elements in its interior for natural light, designed according to local building norms for structural safety and Vastu considerations.
Large, inviting door designed for ease of access. Complementary with floor-to-ceiling windows on the front facade as per design aesthetics and functional requirements.
